title: The Tiger and the Dried Persimmon

sentences.english: Long ago, a hungry tiger roamed near a village looking for food.
sentences.korean: 오래전, 배고픈 호랑이가 음식을 찾아 마을 근처를 배회했습니다.

sentences.english: A tiger came to a village to eat a crying baby.
sentences.korean: 호랑이가 우는 아기를 잡아먹으러 마을에 왔습니다.

sentences.english: He hid outside a house and listened carefully to the sounds inside.
sentences.korean: 그는 집 밖에 숨어 안에서 나는 소리를 주의 깊게 들었습니다.

sentences.english: The baby inside was crying loudly and would not stop.
sentences.korean: 안에 있는 아기가 크게 울며 멈추지 않았습니다.

sentences.english: The mother said "Here comes a tiger!" but the baby didn't stop.
sentences.korean: 엄마가 "호랑이가 온다!"라고 말했지만 아기는 멈추지 않았습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger felt proud that the baby was not scared of him.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 아기가 자신을 무서워하지 않는다는 것에 자존심이 상했습니다.

sentences.english: She said "Here is a dried persimmon!" and the baby stopped crying.
sentences.korean: 그녀가 "여기 곶감이 있다!"라고 말하자 아기는 울음을 그쳤습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger was very surprised that the baby stopped immediately.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 아기가 즉시 멈춘 것에 매우 놀랐습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger thought the persimmon was a monster scarier than him.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 곶감이 자신보다 더 무서운 괴물이라고 생각했습니다.

sentences.english: He decided to leave quickly before the scary persimmon came.
sentences.korean: 그는 무서운 곶감이 오기 전에 빨리 떠나기로 결정했습니다.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, a cattle thief was sneaking around the same village.
sentences.korean: 한편, 소 도둑이 같은 마을 주변을 몰래 돌아다니고 있었습니다.

sentences.english: It was so dark that he could not see very well.
sentences.korean: 너무 어두워서 그는 잘 볼 수가 없었습니다.

sentences.english: A cattle thief jumped on the tiger's back, thinking it was a cow.
sentences.korean: 소 도둑이 소인 줄 알고 호랑이 등 위로 뛰어올랐습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger was shocked and thought the dried persimmon had caught him.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 충격을 받았고 곶감이 자신을 잡았다고 생각했습니다.

sentences.english: The tiger ran away terrified of the "dried persimmon" on his back.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 등 뒤에 있는 "곶감"을 무서워하며 도망쳤습니다.

sentences.english: The thief realized he was on a tiger and held on for dear life.
sentences.korean: 도둑은 자신이 호랑이 위에 있다는 것을 깨닫고 필사적으로 매달렸습니다.

sentences.english: When morning came, the thief jumped off and ran away.
The tiger never came back to that village again, still afraid of dried persimmons.
sentences.korean: 호랑이는 여전히 곶감을 무서워하며 그 마을에 다시는 오지 않았습니다.
